alert.note: Alert for Bottineau; Renville; Rolette (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 12 at 12:37PM CST until January 15 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST MONDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills as low as 35 below zero. For the Wind Chill Warning, life-threatening wind chills as low as 55 below zero expected. * WHERE...Bottineau, Renville, and Rolette Counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 6 PM CST this evening. For the Wind Chill Warning, from 6 PM this evening to noon CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Wind chill values will fall to extremely dangerous levels, which could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes.
info.instruction: People are urged to stay indoors until conditions improve. If you must go outside, wear appropriate clothing, dressing in layers and covering exposed skin. If traveling, carry a winter survival kit and inform others of your travel plans. Keep pets indoors as much as possible.
